name: TNG Accept Cookies
author: Jon Täng

sections.description:
TNG Accept Cookies is a simple WordPress plugin that creates an “accept cookies” bar on your website. A legal requirement in the EU. The plugin sets a cookie if the user accepts cookies. The bar disappears immediately if the user accepts cookies. The next time the website is loaded by the visitor, will the plugin look for the cookie. If the visitor has a cookie, no extra scripts or styles, will load.

Features:
Responsive design with Bootstrap. The plugin checks if Bootstrap is used on the site. Else it will load Bootstrap via CDN.
Language support: English, Swedish

For more information, check out jontang.se
sections.installation:
1. Upload TNG Accept Cookies to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.3.2

Added better information on the settings page.

0.3

Added a settings page

0.2.2

Changed the information URL.
Checked compatibility with WordPress 3.9.

0.2.1

Added Font Awesome icons.
Added the ability to hide the bar.

0.1

The plugin TNG Accept Cookies was created.

short_description: A simple plugin to get a cookie acceptance from the visitors on the website. A legal requirement for websites in Europe.
